title: Infinite Loop Client Restart
body: In the middle of me unboxing loot, my client crashed.  It said it was going to revert back to a previous patch and restart, but every time it does this, it proceeds to immediately crash again, causing an infinite loop of constantly reopening my client and crashing.

I have been watching it rapidly grow over the past 10 minutes, sad that Im missing out on URF time {{item:3070}}

1. Client Crashes
2. Client says it will revert to a previous patch
3. Patching fails, client closes and reopens to attempt a force patch.
4. Client says it is reverting to a previous patch.

I close the client and restart my computer.

Client repeats 1-4.

I check task manager, in all processes. No instances of league are running.

I close the client and make sure all league processes are killed.

I run the Hextech Repair Tool and use it to Force a Repatch.

The repair tool gathers all the logs successfully.

When it gets to the Flushing DNS stage, an error pops up from Windows.
-"Chromium Embedded Framework (CEF) Client Application has stopped working."

Closing this message forces the Repair Tool to close.

Rinse, wash repeat. Windows 8.
